recipe.title: Garlic Bread
recipe.description: Crispy, buttery bread loaded with garlic and herbs

on_enter.say: Right, let's preheat the oven to two hundred degrees celsius, which is about four hundred degrees fahrenheit. This will get it nice and hot for our garlic bread.

steps.descr: Mix butter with garlic, parsley, Parmesan, and salt
steps.instructions: Mix butter with garlic, parsley, Parmesan, and salt

on_enter.say: Now, let's get mixing! Combine the softened butter with the minced garlic, chopped parsley, grated Parmesan, and a pinch of salt. Mix it until it's all beautifully combined.

steps.descr: Slice baguette diagonally, not cutting all the way through
steps.instructions: Slice baguette diagonally, not cutting all the way through

on_enter.say: Let's slice the baguette diagonally, but be careful not to cut all the way through. We want to create lovely pockets for our garlic butter.
Now, let's spread that delicious garlic butter between the slices. Make sure each slice gets a good amount for maximum flavour.
Great! Let's wrap the baguette in foil. This will keep it nice and moist while it bakes.
Time to pop it in the oven. We'll bake it for fifteen minutes. This will get the bread lovely and warm.

steps.descr: Open foil for last 5 minutes to crisp
steps.instructions: Open foil for last 5 minutes to crisp

on_enter.say: Alright, let's open up the foil for the last five minutes to get that perfect crispy top. You'll love the sound of that crunch!

notes.text:
Make extra - it always disappears fast
Add mozzarella for cheesy garlic bread
Perfect alongside pasta or soup
